summary: A talk by Elora Hardy sharing her journey from fashion design to sustainable bamboo construction.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a white background featuring a black ink bottle with a blue tint, accompanied by the text "INKt talks" in a stylized font. The scene transitions to a gray background with the text "This INK talk brought to you by: InMobi The World's Largest Independent Mobile Ad Network www.inmobi.com." The video then shifts to a woman in a brown dress standing on a stage, speaking and gesturing with her hands. The background displays a colorful design with the text "INKt talks.com" in the top left corner. The woman continues to speak, with the background changing to show a large, stylized image of an elephant and the text "INKt talks.com" still visible. The scene transitions to a close-up of a hand-drawn sketch of a house labeled "Elora's House," followed by a photograph of a real house with a thatched roof and wooden doors, surrounded by greenery. The video returns to the woman on stage, with the background now displaying the text "INKt talks.com" and a colorful design featuring various shapes and patterns. The video concludes with the woman continuing to speak on stage, with the audience visible in the foreground.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with gentle, echoing synth music creating a calm and ethereal atmosphere, suitable for reflection or storytelling. Then, an enthusiastic female speaker starts sharing a personal story with a warm tone. She references a "connection with nature," describing her childhood and the building of a "fairy mushroom house" with her parents in Bali, sharing her love for life there, and dancing for the Gods. The clip ends with the same synth music from the beginning.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a woman in a brown dress standing on a stage, holding a microphone and speaking to an audience. The background features a colorful, artistic design with the text "INKtalks.com" displayed prominently. The scene transitions to a group of children dressed in traditional attire, performing a dance in a lush garden setting. The children are wearing vibrant, patterned clothing, and one of them is adorned with a flower crown. The video then returns to the woman on stage, who continues her presentation, gesturing with her hands and engaging with the audience. The audience is shown attentively listening, with some individuals taking notes. The video then shifts to a fashion show, showcasing models wearing various outfits from the Donna Karan New York collection. The models walk down the runway, displaying a range of designs, including dresses with bold patterns and colors. The video returns to the woman on stage, who continues her presentation, emphasizing her points with hand gestures. The final scene features a collage of fashion-related images, including magazine covers and advertisements, highlighting the theme of fashion and style. The video concludes with the woman on stage, still speaking and engaging with the audience, maintaining a professional and dynamic atmosphere throughout.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with one female speaker reflecting on her childhood. Her tone is nostalgic as she recounts going off to art school in the states. She speaks about her aspirations as an artist. The speaker's tone becomes more energetic as she narrates moving to New York City to work with a successful fashion designer. She explains how she painted on fabric, and her prints appeared on runways. She describes it as learning to interpret "the tone and the texture of the moment." The speaker expresses how "it was noticed", and she felt like she "had made it in New York City." She shares that she "put together a fabulous wardrobe" and met the love of her life in a yoga class.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman in a brown dress speaking on stage at an event called "INKtalks.com." She holds a microphone and gestures with her hands as she addresses the audience. The backdrop is colorful and decorated with various designs, including a large screen displaying images of bamboo and a lush green landscape. The stage is well-lit, and the woman appears confident and engaged in her presentation. The atmosphere is professional and focused on the topic at hand. The video transitions between close-up shots of the speaker and wider shots of the stage, showcasing the event's vibrant setting and the speaker's dynamic presentation style.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio starts with a female speaker talking in a narrative tone about questioning the future and returning to Bali. She then mentions her father planting a seedling in front of his house and that seedling turning into a giant clump of bamboo. She says a bamboo shoot reaches its full height in three months and becomes mature in three years, and that this will provide timber every year for the rest of her life. The speaker describes bamboo as "Asia's favorite scaffolding material" and an "overgrown grass" with potential. She says Linda Garland founded the Bamboo Movement in Bali and innovated safe treatment solutions. She notes that it was difficult to protect bamboo from insects, and that borax, a natural salt, turns bamboo into a permanent building material. The speaker concludes that this "inspired a lot of people."

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman in a brown dress standing on a stage, holding a microphone and gesturing as she speaks. The backdrop includes a large screen displaying images of a thatched-roof structure surrounded by lush greenery, with the text "INKtalks.com" visible in the top left corner. The stage is decorated with colorful, abstract designs, including a large elephant motif. The woman appears to be giving a presentation or talk, as she is seen speaking and gesturing towards the audience. The video transitions between shots of the woman on stage and close-ups of the thatched-roof structure, emphasizing its unique architecture and natural surroundings. The atmosphere is professional and engaging, with the woman actively interacting with the audience through her speech and gestures.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a female speaker, reminiscing about her father, John, and his creation of the Green School using bamboo in Bali. Her tone is warm, reflecting admiration and excitement for the promise of the future and the opportunity the school provides. She talks about how she decided to quit her glamorous New York City life to come home and be part of that future.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a large group of people gathered in a lush, green forest setting, all wearing matching green t-shirts and holding sticks with numbers attached to them. The individuals are smiling and appear to be in high spirits, suggesting a sense of camaraderie and enjoyment. The numbers on the sticks range from 1 to 41, indicating that this could be a team-building exercise or a group activity. The environment is dense with foliage, and the atmosphere is lively and cheerful. The text "ketalks.com" is visible in the top left corner, likely indicating the source or sponsor of the event. The group's expressions and body language convey excitement and enthusiasm, contributing to the overall positive and energetic mood of the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a female speaker who proudly states she founded her company, called "Ibuku." She explains the meaning of the name, saying "'Ibu' means mother, 'Ku' means mine," and that "Ibuku is my mother and your mother, it's mother Earth." Her tone is enthusiastic and declarative. There are no other discernible sounds in the clip.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman in a brown dress standing on a stage, delivering a speech or presentation. She is holding a microphone and gesturing with her hands as she speaks. Behind her, a large screen displays an image of a group of people in a forest setting, some holding signs. The stage is decorated with colorful, whimsical designs, including a large purple and yellow mask-like figure and various abstract shapes. The text "INKtalks.com" is visible in the top left corner of the screen, indicating the event or organization hosting the talk. The woman appears engaged and animated, occasionally looking to her side, possibly addressing different parts of the audience or referring to notes. The overall atmosphere is lively and creative, with the stage design adding a playful and artistic touch to the presentation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a woman speaking in a passionate tone, describing her team as "an incredible group of people," specifically "artisans and builders of Green School," emphasizing that they are young professionals. She humorously notes that their mothers might prefer them building skyscrapers in Jakarta, "but here they are," pioneering a new future.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a serene view of a bamboo house nestled in a lush, green environment, bathed in sunlight filtering through the trees. The scene transitions to a close-up of hands meticulously crafting a bamboo structure, with sketches and tools scattered around, indicating a workshop setting. A woman in an orange dress is then seen presenting on stage, with a large screen behind her displaying the text "INK" and various artistic designs, suggesting a talk or presentation related to the theme of the video. The narrative continues with a man in a green shirt working on a detailed bamboo model, surrounded by natural elements, emphasizing the craftsmanship involved. The video then returns to the stage, where the woman continues her presentation, with the screen now showing a 3D model of a building, reinforcing the theme of architectural design. The final scene shifts to a group of men outdoors, collaborating on a bamboo project, highlighting the communal aspect of the craft. Throughout the video, the text "INKtalks.com" appears in the top left corner, indicating the source or platform of the content. The video effectively showcases the blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern presentation, set against a backdrop of natural beauty and collaborative effort.
events_list.audio_caption: A female speaker begins by introducing their current project, "Green Village," describing it as a community of 30 homes, custom-built near a school, emphasizing their 3D design approach and bamboo model-making process. She describes bamboo model making as an art, and emphasizes that is is technical and contains magic, with the noise of some form of machinery heard faintly during the statement. There is brief applause. She explains that the bamboo model is replicated in the computer and given to the craftsmen who will build the house.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a woman standing on a stage, dressed in a brown sleeveless shirt, holding a remote control in her right hand. She appears to be giving a presentation, as indicated by her gestures and the presence of a microphone clipped to her shirt. The background features a dark blue backdrop with the text "INKtalks.com" in white, along with a stylized graphic of a flower. The scene then transitions to an outdoor setting, showcasing a large, intricate structure made of woven bamboo. This structure, resembling a multi-tiered pagoda, is set against a backdrop of lush greenery and palm trees, suggesting a tropical environment. The text "INKtalks.com" remains visible in the top left corner throughout the video, maintaining a consistent branding element. The video captures the contrast between the indoor presentation and the outdoor architectural marvel, highlighting the versatility of the presenter's topic.
events_list.audio_caption: A female speaker recounts an experience where blueprints were used as a napping spot, setting a lighthearted tone. She then delves into the specifics of a "bamboo model," describing how each stick represents a column and how individuals measure and select unique bamboo poles, suggesting a natural building process. The speech is accompanied by clear audio quality, and then, at the end, the sound stops.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a serene view of a traditional bamboo house nestled among tall palm trees, showcasing its intricate construction and natural surroundings. The scene then transitions to a woman standing on a stage, dressed in a brown sleeveless blouse, speaking into a microphone. The backdrop features a dark screen with blue geometric shapes and the text "INKtalks.com" in the top left corner, indicating the event or platform. The woman appears engaged in delivering a presentation or speech, with her facial expressions and gestures suggesting a focused and informative delivery. The video seamlessly blends the tranquility of the natural setting with the dynamic atmosphere of a professional talk, highlighting the contrast between the two environments.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a single female speaker posing a question, "Can we build four-story houses without cranes?" Then she describes a structure made of bamboo shingles saying, "it looks like something that I think the mushroom fairy would be happy to live in." Her tone is informative and engaging. She mentions following clear design principles in creating these homes.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a view of a forested area where several holes have been dug into the ground, possibly for planting or other purposes. The ground is uneven, with some areas covered in dirt and others with greenery. The scene then transitions to a woman standing in front of a colorful backdrop, speaking and gesturing with her hands. She is wearing a brown sleeveless top and has long, wavy hair. The backdrop features a purple and pink design with decorative elements, and the text "ink.talks.com" is visible in the top left corner, indicating the source of the video. The woman appears to be engaged in a presentation or talk, as she uses expressive hand movements to emphasize her points. The video then shifts back to an outdoor setting, showing a young plant growing in a small patch of soil surrounded by bamboo stalks. The ground is uneven, with visible roots and soil, and the atmosphere suggests a natural, possibly rural environment. The video captures a blend of natural and human-made elements, transitioning between different settings and activities.
events_list.audio_caption: A female speaker describes an environmentally conscious building process. She speaks in a measured and passionate tone, explaining how they "follow the natural contours of the slope," "hand carve deep foundation points," and "build light on the land," emphasizing their respect for the environment. The speaker concludes by noting that the construction was so mindful that a "little plant survived six months of construction."

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a person's hands working meticulously with bamboo sticks, using a hammer to shape them. The individual is dressed in a black garment and is seated on a bamboo mat, surrounded by bamboo pieces and tools, indicating a traditional craft setting. The scene transitions to a cat walking across a bamboo floor, exploring the area with curiosity. The next frame shows a group of people working on a large bamboo structure, with one person standing on a scaffold, suggesting a construction or architectural project. A sketch of bamboo structures is visible in the foreground, providing a blueprint for the project. The video then shifts to a woman speaking on stage, wearing a brown shirt, with the text "INKtalks.com" displayed on the screen, indicating a presentation or talk related to the topic. The background features a dark setting with blue geometric shapes, adding a modern touch to the scene. The video effectively combines traditional craftsmanship with modern presentation, highlighting the versatility and cultural significance of bamboo.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio features a sole female speaker who describes handmade houses in a curious and informative tone. She references a bamboo peg going into the floor, explaining the meticulous process of hand-whittling and rigorously testing each peg. She emphasizes the unique quality of each home and structure, showcasing the intensive sketching, dreaming, modeling, and building process behind them.

events_list.video_caption:
The video begins with a group of men working together on a bamboo structure, possibly constructing a hut or a similar building. They are seen climbing and balancing on the bamboo framework, with one man in a blue shirt and another in a red shirt prominently visible. The background shows a lush, green environment, indicating that the construction is taking place outdoors, likely in a tropical or forested area. The men appear focused and engaged in their task, demonstrating teamwork and coordination.

The scene then transitions to a woman standing on a stage, speaking to an audience. She is wearing a brown sleeveless top and has long, wavy hair. The background features a colorful, artistic design with silhouettes of architectural elements, such as a tower and a dome, in shades of purple and red. The text "INKtalks.com" is visible in the top left corner of the frame, suggesting that this is part of a talk or presentation series. The woman is gesturing with her hands as she speaks, indicating that she is actively engaging with her audience. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the woman appearing confident and knowledgeable about the topic she is discussing.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a female speaker expressing gratitude towards the "men that make it possible," who are described as "the artists and craftsmen of Bali". The speaker expresses pride in working with them, mentioning knowing them in childhood and now being back. There are no background or ambient sounds present.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman in a brown dress speaking on stage, holding a remote control, and gesturing with her hands. The background is adorned with colorful, abstract designs and silhouettes, including a large face and various shapes. The text "inktalks.com" is visible in the top left corner, indicating the event's website. The scene transitions to a display of intricately carved wooden sculptures, showcasing a variety of figures and objects, including a prominent seated figure with a hat. The video then returns to the woman on stage, now with a different background featuring a ship and other abstract designs. Throughout the video, the woman continues to speak and gesture, engaging with the audience. The overall atmosphere is vibrant and artistic, with a focus on visual storytelling and cultural elements.
events_list.audio_caption: A female speaker begins by stating that "if they weren't here building with us," some individuals would "most likely be making souvenirs out of what's left of the forests." She then mentions how much they've learned, that it's "only been a few years," and "we're still working at it". Her tone is earnest and conversational.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a construction scene where workers are assembling a large, dome-shaped structure made of bamboo. The workers are seen on the roof, handling materials and tools, with a clear sky and palm trees in the background, indicating a tropical setting. The scene transitions to the interior of the completed structure, showcasing a spacious, open-plan design with bamboo walls and floors. The interior is well-lit with natural light streaming through large windows, highlighting the intricate bamboo architecture. The video then focuses on a cozy, circular room with a wicker door, a comfortable seating area, and a television, emphasizing the use of natural materials and the seamless integration of indoor and outdoor spaces. The final scene features a luxurious bedroom with a large bed, a wooden floor, and a view of the surrounding greenery through large windows. The room is decorated with bamboo elements, including a circular swing and a staircase, creating a harmonious blend of modern comfort and natural aesthetics. Throughout the video, the text 'inktalks.com' appears in the top left corner, indicating the source or creator of the content.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a female speaker discussing replacing plastic skylights with recycled car windshields, while acknowledging the presence of aluminum and glue in their structures. She continues to describe their advanced bamboo structures as homes filled with beauty and joy, mentioning sunlight, breezes, and occasional bugs. She then talks about a cozy TV room basket resembling a fairy mushroom house. Further on, she adds that bedrooms can be closed up with air conditioning. Lastly, she mentions customization and a hand-pounded copper bathtub. The speaker's tone throughout is informative and enthusiastic.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long, wavy brown hair, wearing a sleeveless brown shirt, speaking on stage at an event. She is seen gesturing with her hands and holding a microphone, indicating she is addressing an audience. The backdrop includes a large screen displaying the text "INKtalks.com" and a series of blue cubes, suggesting a modern and professional setting. The scene transitions to a serene outdoor environment, showcasing a bamboo structure with a pool surrounded by lush greenery and palm trees, evoking a sense of tranquility and natural beauty. The video then returns to the stage, where the woman continues her presentation, with the large screen now displaying the outdoor scene, reinforcing the connection between her talk and the visual content. The atmosphere is one of engagement and inspiration, with the speaker's expressive gestures and the visually appealing backdrop contributing to the overall impact of the presentation.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a female speaker discussing building a sustainable hotel in Bali, emphasizing how people can connect with nature. Her tone is enthusiastic and persuasive, highlighting the strength and longevity of bamboo houses. She reveals her secret plan is to showcase possibilities, inspire, and connect with people about the potential of this material, hoping it will become desirable and used more widely. The speaker sounds passionate about the material.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a woman with long brown hair, wearing a brown shirt, speaking on stage with a microphone attached to her ear. The background is dark with blue geometric shapes and a purple leaf-like design, and the text "INKtalks.com" is visible in the top left corner. The scene transitions to an image of a large, traditional bamboo house with a thatched roof, set against a clear sky. The house features a prominent gable and an open entrance, with a smaller structure attached to its side. The video then shows a street view of a similar bamboo building with a corrugated metal roof, where several motorcycles are parked in front. A man in a white shirt is seated on a bench, and various items are scattered around the area. The sky is bright blue with a few clouds, and the text "INKtalks.com" remains in the top left corner. The video returns to the woman on stage, continuing her speech with the same background and text. The scene transitions back to the bamboo house, now with a clearer view of the surrounding area, including more buildings and greenery. The video concludes with the woman on stage, still speaking, with the same background and text.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio features a single female speaker enthusiastically describing a chocolate factory that is 2000 square meters and built from bamboo. She mentions housing for garbage recyclers and emphasizes that this is simple, inexpensive construction, earthquake-resistant, and a solution for the tropics. She then transitions to talking about ways to evolve and grow in the world.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman in a brown dress standing on a stage, delivering a presentation at an event called "INK talks." The stage is adorned with colorful, whimsical decorations, including a large screen displaying the event's logo and the website "INKtalks.com." The woman, with long, wavy hair, speaks confidently, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. The audience is visible in the foreground, attentively watching her. The video includes a transition to a close-up of a child's drawing titled "Elora's House," which depicts a whimsical mushroom house. The presentation continues with the woman on stage, maintaining her engaging demeanor. The video concludes with a slide displaying the event's website and social media handles, encouraging viewers to connect online. The overall atmosphere is professional yet creative, with a focus on storytelling and visual elements.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a female speaker, calm and earnest, discussing change and taking a personal stand. She shares her experience in building a house without formal education in architecture or engineering, highlighting the importance of a good team and big dreams. Her tone transitions to proud and thankful as she concludes with, "Thank you." Applause follows her statement, indicating the end of her presentation. The audio concludes with a gentle, relaxed musical piece that fades out, featuring keys and a bass-like sound.
